actions.text: Amendment SA 2587 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2587 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 64. Record Vote Number: 331.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2587.

Amendment SA 2587 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S12926-12938) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a temporary windfall profit tax on crude oil and to rebate the tax collected back to the American consumer, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2587 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 64. Record Vote Number: 331.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2587 proposed by Senator Dorgan.

purpose: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a temporary windfall profit tax on crude oil and to rebate the tax collected back to the American consumer, and for other purposes.
